metadata.title: CVE-2022-48846 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:block: release rq qos structures for queue without diskblkcg_init_queue() may add rq qos structures to request queue, previouslyblk_cleanup_queue() calls rq_qos_exit() to release them, but commit8e141f9eb803 ("block: drain file system I/O on del_gendisk")moves rq_qos_exit() into del_gendisk(), so memory leak is causedbecause queues may not have disk, such as un-present scsi luns, nvmeadmin queue, ...Fixes the issue by adding rq_qos_exit() to blk_cleanup_queue() back.BTW, v5.18 won't need this patch any more since we moveblkcg_init_queue()/blkcg_exit_queue() into disk allocation/releasehandler, and patches have been in for-5.18/block.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-48846` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.15.0-35-generic - 5.15.0-35.36
linux-image-5.15.0-35-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-35.36
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-35-generic - 5.15.0-35.36
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-35-generic-64k - 5.15.0-35.36
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1008-kvm - 5.15.0-1008.8
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1009-aws - 5.15.0-1009.11
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1008-azure - 5.15.0-1008.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1019-azure-fde - 5.15.0-1019.24.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1011-bluefield - 5.15.0-1011.13
Available for NVIDIA BlueField platforms

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1006-gcp - 5.15.0-1006.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1006-gke - 5.15.0-1006.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1001-gkeop - 5.15.0-1001.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1005-ibm - 5.15.0-1005.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1008-intel-iotg - 5.15.0-1008.11
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-35-lowlatency - 5.15.0-35.36
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-35-lowlatency-64k - 5.15.0-35.36
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1005-nvidia - 5.15.0-1005.5
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1005-nvidia-64k - 5.15.0-1005.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1007-oracle - 5.15.0-1007.9
No subscription required

linux-image-5.15.0-1011-raspi - 5.15.0-1011.13

No subscription required

linux-image-5.15.0-1022-xilinx-zynqmp - 5.15.0-1022.26
No subscription required
